short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that runs web searches in your browser and downloads the results automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension takes in a plain text file of search terms separated by newlines. It runs and downloads these searches as html files to a folder in your downloads. Useful to grab a bunch of search results for offline use quickly!
